column4: Hi guys! Anyone here has experience wiht Ubuntu PXE installs?
Ive ran FOG on Ubuntu before, which PXE boots systems for imaging.
im trying to install ubuntu from a tftp server running on windows, problem is, i need to preload drivers for my laptop net hardware
hmm, wouldnt have any experience there. My experience is the opposite - I use ubuntu as the server, and image windows clients.
